title: All DuckDB Functions
text: goal dd provide documentation DuckDB‚Äôs functions, later also easy way test . meant used conjunction duckplyr duckdb.

title: All DuckDB Functions
text: can install development version dd like :

title: All DuckDB Functions
code: library(dd) dd$acos #> function(x = DOUBLE) { #>   stop("DuckDB function acos() is not available in R.") #> } #> <bytecode: 0xdeadbeef> #> <environment: namespace:dd>  help(acos, package = "dd") DuckDB function acos  Description:       Computes the arccosine of x.  Arguments:         x: 'DOUBLE'  Examples:       ## Not run:       acos(0.5)      ## End(Not run)

title: DuckDB function apply ‚Äî apply
text: Returns list result applying lambda function element input list. See Lambda Functions section details.

title: DuckDB function array_apply ‚Äî array_apply
text: Returns list result applying lambda function element input list. See Lambda Functions section details.

title: DuckDB function array_distinct ‚Äî array_distinct
text: Removes duplicates NULLs list. preserve original order.

title: DuckDB function array_filter ‚Äî array_filter
text: Constructs list elements input list lambda function returns true.

title: DuckDB function array_has_all ‚Äî array_has_all
text: Returns true elements l2 l1. NULLs ignored.

title: DuckDB function array_has_any ‚Äî array_has_any
text: Returns true lists element common. NULLs ignored.

title: DuckDB function array_indexof ‚Äî array_indexof
text: Returns index element list contains element. element found, returns NULL.

title: DuckDB function array_position ‚Äî array_position
text: Returns index element list contains element. element found, returns NULL.

title: DuckDB function array_reduce ‚Äî array_reduce
text: Returns single value result applying lambda function element input list, starting first element repeatedly applying lambda function result previous application next element list.

title: DuckDB function array_select ‚Äî array_select
text: Returns list based elements selected index_list.

title: DuckDB function array_transform ‚Äî array_transform
text: Returns list result applying lambda function element input list. See Lambda Functions section details.

title: DuckDB function array_where ‚Äî array_where
text: Returns list BOOLEANs mask_list applied mask value_list.

title: DuckDB function ascii ‚Äî ascii
text: Returns integer represents Unicode code point first character string.

title: DuckDB function bit_position ‚Äî bit_position
text: Returns first starting index specified substring within bits, zero present. first (leftmost) bit indexed 1.

title: DuckDB function can_cast_implicitly ‚Äî can_cast_implicitly
text: Whether can implicitly cast source type type.

title: DuckDB function chr ‚Äî chr
text: Returns character corresponding ASCII code value Unicode code point.

title: DuckDB function damerau_levenshtein ‚Äî damerau_levenshtein
text: Extension Levenshtein distance also include transposition adjacent characters allowed edit operation. words, minimum number edit operations (insertions, deletions, substitutions transpositions) required change one string another. Different case considered different.

title: dd: All DuckDB Functions ‚Äî dd-package
text: Lists DuckDB functions integration R's help system.

title: DuckDB functions ‚Äî dd
code: dd[1:3] #> $acos #> function(x = DOUBLE) { #>   stop("DuckDB function acos() is not available in R.") #> } #> <bytecode: 0x557fbf490648> #> <environment: namespace:dd> #>  #> $acosh #> function(x = DOUBLE) { #>   stop("DuckDB function acosh() is not available in R.") #> } #> <bytecode: 0x557fbf492530> #> <environment: namespace:dd> #>  #> $alias #> function(expr = ANY) { #>   stop("DuckDB function alias() is not available in R.") #> } #> <bytecode: 0x557fbf494418> #> <environment: namespace:dd> #>

title: DuckDB function decode ‚Äî decode
text: Convert blob varchar. Fails blob valid utf-8.

title: DuckDB function editdist3 ‚Äî editdist3
text: minimum number single-character edits (insertions, deletions substitutions) required change one string . Different case considered different.

title: DuckDB function encode ‚Äî encode
text: Convert varchar blob. Converts utf-8 characters literal encoding.

title: DuckDB function enum_code ‚Äî enum_code
text: Returns numeric value backing given enum value.

title: DuckDB function enum_first ‚Äî enum_first
text: Returns first value input enum type.

title: DuckDB function enum_last ‚Äî enum_last
text: Returns last value input enum type.

title: DuckDB function enum_range ‚Äî enum_range
text: Returns values input enum type array.

title: DuckDB function enum_range_boundary ‚Äî enum_range_boundary
text: Returns range two given enum values array. values must enum type. first parameter NULL, result starts first value enum type. second parameter NULL, result ends last value enum type.

title: DuckDB function even ‚Äî even
text: Rounds x next even number rounding away zero.

title: DuckDB function factorial ‚Äî factorial
text: Factorial x. Computes product current integer integers .

title: DuckDB function filter ‚Äî filter
text: Constructs list elements input list lambda function returns true.

title: DuckDB function from_base64 ‚Äî from_base64
text: Convert base64 encoded string character string.

title: DuckDB function get_bit ‚Äî get_bit
text: Extracts nth bit bitstring; first (leftmost) bit indexed 0.

title: DuckDB function hamming ‚Äî hamming
text: number positions different characters 2 strings equal length. Different case considered different.

title: DuckDB function ilike_escape ‚Äî ilike_escape
text: Returns true string matches like_specifier (see Pattern Matching) using case-insensitive matching. escape_character used search wildcard characters string.

title: DuckDB function ilike_escape ‚Äî ilike_escape
text: string VARCHAR like_specifier VARCHAR escape_character VARCHAR

title: DuckDB function instr ‚Äî instr
text: Returns location first occurrence needle haystack, counting 1. Returns 0 match found.

title: DuckDB function is_histogram_other_bin ‚Äî is_histogram_other_bin
text: Whether provided value histogram "" bin (used values belonging provided bin).

title: DuckDB function jaccard ‚Äî jaccard
text: Jaccard similarity two strings. Different case considered different. Returns number 0 1.

title: DuckDB function levenshtein ‚Äî levenshtein
text: minimum number single-character edits (insertions, deletions substitutions) required change one string . Different case considered different.

title: DuckDB function like_escape ‚Äî like_escape
text: Returns true string matches like_specifier (see Pattern Matching) using case-sensitive matching. escape_character used search wildcard characters string.

title: DuckDB function like_escape ‚Äî like_escape
text: string VARCHAR like_specifier VARCHAR escape_character VARCHAR

title: DuckDB function mismatches ‚Äî mismatches
text: number positions different characters 2 strings equal length. Different case considered different.

text: Convert string Unicode NFC normalized string. Useful comparisons ordering text data mixed NFC normalized .

text: Returns false string matches like_specifier (see Pattern Matching) using case-sensitive matching. escape_character used search wildcard characters string.

title: DuckDB function ord ‚Äî ord
text: Returns unicode codepoint first character string.

title: DuckDB function position ‚Äî position
text: Returns location first occurrence needle haystack, counting 1. Returns 0 match found.

title: DuckDB function reduce ‚Äî reduce
text: Returns single value result applying lambda function element input list, starting first element repeatedly applying lambda function result previous application next element list.

title: DuckDB function regexp_escape ‚Äî regexp_escape
text: Escapes potentially meaningful regexp characters input string.

text: string VARCHAR source VARCHAR target VARCHAR

text: Pads string character right count characters.

title: DuckDB function set_bit ‚Äî set_bit
text: Sets nth bit bitstring newvalue; first (leftmost) bit indexed 0. Returns new bitstring.

text: bitstring BIT index INTEGER new_value INTEGER

title: DuckDB function strpos ‚Äî strpos
text: Returns location first occurrence needle haystack, counting 1. Returns 0 match found.

title: DuckDB function timetz_byte_comparable ‚Äî timetz_byte_comparable
text: Converts TIME TIME ZONE integer sort key.

title: DuckDB function to_timestamp ‚Äî to_timestamp
text: Converts secs since epoch timestamp time zone.

title: DuckDB function translate ‚Äî translate
text: Replaces character string matches character set corresponding character set. longer , occurrences extra characters deleted.

title: DuckDB function typeof ‚Äî typeof
text: Returns name data type result expression.

title: DuckDB function unicode ‚Äî unicode
text: Returns unicode codepoint first character string.

title: DuckDB function union_extract ‚Äî union_extract
text: Extract value named tags union. NULL tag currently selected.

title: DuckDB function union_tag ‚Äî union_tag

text: Escapes input string encoding can included URL query parameter.

code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ url_encode('this string has/ special+ characters>') } # }
